body.p:
Louisville June 15th/62
Friend Prewet
Dear Sir

Enclosed Please find an affidavitt on which I wish you to procure a requisition on the ^Gov of^ state of Iowa. for the apprehension of one Robt Ward. a fugitive from Justice, if possible I wish you to forward it by conductor on down train ^this^ Monday Evening as I wish to start at, 9 P. M. Monday night, I will be at Depot to receive it from him please have Delos. T Bligh appointed agent to proceed to Iowa &c.

and Much Oblige
Your humble servent
D. T. Bligh
Detective Police
